mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_KIDS조직도기본 조회 (OrgchtMapper.getOrgcht) */ SELECT emp_no ,dept_no ,dept_nm ,emp_nm FROM kids_own.TB_PP_M_ORGCHT WHERE 1=1 AND emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_KIDS조직도기본 수정 (OrgchtMapper.updateOrgcht) */ UPDATE kids_own.TB_PP_M_ORGCHT SET dept_no = coalesce(#{deptNo}, dept_no) ,dept_nm = coalesce(#{deptNm}, dept_nm) ,emp_nm = coalesce(#{empNm}, emp_nm) WHERE 1=1 AND emp_no = #{empNo}
